## Source: ossf-package-analysis (67e9eea857d57488a09639cf7c62b2507c6f72aa291543d524e2dd9a86532a73)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'uuid-utils' @ 10.10.11 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
